messages.y6lE0k: <0>Your smart contract wallet is only deployed on Polygon Network for now. Please do not receive funds on other chains with the same address.</0> We will support more chains in the future.
messages.Gi/hb0: Click <0>here</0> and fill the SmartPay Wallet whitelist application form.

messages.74cj7m: Create a new Persona in Pop-up.
messages.L9UK9K: Create a SmartPay Wallet with your Twitter account.

messages.8b+5vw: MASK token can be used to pay gas fee.
messages.G1WA4m: More efficient and simpler signature algorithms (eg. Schnorr, BLS)
messages.vp4MqR: Post-quantum safe signature algorithms (eg. Lamport, Winternitz)

messages.jdbCoK: Set MASK tokens to pay gas fee when interacting with Polygon Network.

messages.tMHWyK: SmartPay is based on ERC-4337 and is currently deployed on Polygon Network. Multiple chains will be supported in the future. ERC-4337 is a new wallet proposal that would open the door for creativity in wallet design and could provide more important features. And we will design more fascinating features based on the new wallet proposal in Mask Network.
messages.SVo6CO: Sorry, you are not in the free trial whitelist.
messages.WKhaQb: The ERC-4337 will open the door to more creativity and more important features for wallet design.
messages.Gaq/7P: This SmartPay Wallet can only receive assets on Polygon Network. Please do not use this address to receive assets from other EVM chains.
messages.zgo0BR: User need to deploy the SmartPay Wallet on Polygon Network before using it for blockchain interaction. Wallet that has not been deployed can receive assets, but cannot send any transactions.
messages.Mkyh69: Users can use SmartPay Wallet (free gas fee and private key change) only on Polygon Network at the moment.
messages.Re0DcC: What to know before SmartPay Wallet deployment:
messages.tzlwby: You are in the trial whitelist.
messages.hFAVvh: You can change management account of SmartPay Wallet. In Mask Network, both Persona and Mask Wallet can be authorized as management account.
messages.1sijtW: You can follow Mask Network <0>Twitter</0> or <1>Discord</1> to participate in the event and get free qualification to have gas-free blockchain experiences with SmartPay. Soon we will publish the second batch of users participating in the test!
